data.description:
T O D A Y, we’re welcoming a young mother and her two children into our care in Thailand!

She was trafficked. Physically abused. Refused any salary. She bravely escaped with her two children when she was 8 months pregnant, and one of our social workers found them at a border area without any food or support.

Now? She’s safe, free, and receiving the care she needs. When she’s ready to go back to work, our A21 Thailand team will help her find safe employment options. #BREAKINGNEWS
